mapper.select: select cal_no, cal_start, cal_end, cal_title, cal_content, cal_writer from calendar where cal_writer=#{cal_writer} and substr(cal_start,1,8)=#{yyyyMMdd} order by desc
mapper.update: update calendar set cal_title=#{cal_title}, cal_content=#{cal_content}, cal_start=#{cal_start}, cal_end=#{cal_end}, where cal_no=#{cal_no}
